@notice Function to distibute non-underlyingToken Bath Token incentives to pool withdrawers
 @dev Note that bonusTokens adhere to the same feeTo and feeBPS pattern. Fees sit on BathBuddy to act as effectively accrued to the pool.
*** ERC - 20 Standard ***
@notice EIP 2612
@notice The underlying ERC-20 that this bathToken handles

@notice The best-guess total claim on assets the Bath Token has
 @dev returns the amount of underlying ERC20 tokens in this pool in addition to any tokens that are outstanding in the Rubicon order book seeking market-making yield (outstandingAmount)

rebalance(address,address,uint256,uint25.details: Sends non-underlyingToken fill elsewhere in the Pools system, typically it's sister asset within a trading pair (e.g. ETH-USDC)Strategists presently accrue rewards in the filled asset not underlyingToken

underlyingBalance().details: returns the amount of underlying ERC20 tokens in this pool in addition to any tokens that are outstanding in the Rubicon order book seeking market-making yield (outstandingAmount)

PERMIT_TYPEHASH.details: keccak256("Permit(address owner,address spender,uint256 value,uint256 nonce,uint256 deadline)");

deprecatedMapping.details: Intentionally unused DEPRECATED STORAGE VARIABLE to maintain contiguous state on proxy-wrapped contracts. Consider it a beautiful scar of incremental progress 📈

deprecatedStorageArray.details: Intentionally unused DEPRECATED STORAGE VARIABLE to maintain contiguous state on proxy-wrapped contracts. Consider it a beautiful scar of incremental progress 📈Keeping deprecated variables maintains consistent network-agnostic contract abis when moving to new chains and versions

outstandingAmount.details: quantity of underlyingToken that is in the orderbook that the pool still has a claim onThe underlyingToken is effectively mark-to-marketed when it enters the book and it could be returned at a loss due to poor strategist performanceoutstandingAmount is NOT inclusive of any non-underlyingToken assets sitting on the Bath Tokens that have filled to here and are awaiting rebalancing to the underlyingToken by strategists

LogDeposit(uint256,address,uint256,addre.notice: Log details about a pool deposit

LogPoolCancel(uint256,address,uint256,ui.notice: Log details about a pool order canceled in the Rubicon Market book

LogPoolOffer(uint256,address,uint256,uin.notice: Log details about a pool order placed in the Rubicon Market book

LogRebalance(address,address,address,uin.notice: Log details about a pool rebalance

LogRemoveFilledTradeAmount(address,uint2.notice: Log the credit to outstanding amount for funds that have been filled market-making

LogWithdraw(uint256,address,uint256,addr.notice: Log details about a pool withdraw

RubiconMarketAddress().notice: The RubiconMarket.sol instance that all pool liquidity is intially directed to as market-making offers

approveMarket().notice: Admin-only function to approve Bath Token's RubiconMarketAddress with the maximum integer value (infinite approval)

bathHouse().notice: The Bath House admin of the Bath Token

bonusTokens(uint256).notice: Array of Bonus ERC-20 tokens that are given as liquidity incentives to pool withdrawers

cancel(uint256,uint256).notice: The function for a strategist to cancel an outstanding Market Offer

feeBPS().notice: The basis point fee rate that is paid on withdrawing the underlyingToken and bonusTokens

feeTo().notice: The withdrawal fee recipient, typically the Bath Token itself

initialize(address,address,address).notice: Proxy-safe initialization of storage; the constructor

initialized().notice: The initialization status of the Bath Token

outstandingAmount().notice: The amount of underlying deposits that are outstanding attempting market-making on the order book for yield

placeOffer(uint256,address,uint256,addre.notice: The function that places a bid and/or ask in the orderbook for a given pair from this pool

rebalance(address,address,uint256,uint25.notice: This function returns filled orders to the correct liquidity pool and sends strategist rewards to the Bath Pair

removeFilledTradeAmount(uint256).notice: A function called by BathPair to maintain proper accounting of outstandingAmount

rewardsVestingWallet().notice: Address of the OZ Vesting Wallet which acts as means to vest bonusToken incentives to pool HODLers

setBathHouse(address).notice: Admin-only function to set a Bath Token's Bath House admin

setBonusToken(address).notice: Admin-only function to add a bonus token to bonusTokens for pool incentives

setFeeBPS(uint256).notice: Admin-only function to set a Bath Token's feeBPS

setFeeTo(address).notice: Admin-only function to set a Bath Token's fee recipient, typically the pool itself

setMarket(address).notice: Admin-only function to set a Bath Token's market address

underlyingBalance().notice: The best-guess total claim on assets the Bath Token has

underlyingERC20().notice: The underlying ERC-20 that this bathToken handles

underlyingToken().notice: The underlying ERC-20 token which is the core asset of the Bath Token vault

withdraw(uint256).notice: Withdraw your bathTokens for the underlyingToken
